channel.title: Help training 60-70 worth the lvls?
channel.description:
hey. i got an account, lvl 86, 74 atk 76 str 60 defence and 35 prayer.
i got a fighter torso and i am pretty good.
what i can hit is.
whip - 30 with db axe spec, about 27 without.
d mace - 33 non potted 40 super str potted.
drag dagger p++ - 23-24.
first i am wondering, should i get 70 defence or stay at 60, because ill be like level 90 after 70 defence. im not sure what to do
and if i do get 70 defence, where should i get 60-70, also where can i get 76-80 strength. please help

item.title: Help training 60-70 worth the lvls?
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Level 86? Lessers or TzHaar monsters is a great choice, with a decent drop along with it.

Read full topic

item.title: Help training 60-70 worth the lvls?
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Yeah, when I started playing there was hardly anyone there. To most they were just a rumour. I think the people that knew about the experiments tried to keep it under their hats for as long as possible…

If there’s someone there and you really wanna train, just keep stealing their NPCs and they’ll eventually hop. I usually go to the same spot and it’s fine.

Read full topic

item.title: Help training 60-70 worth the lvls?
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Experiments are always full and respawning takes forever.

Read full topic

item.title: Help training 60-70 worth the lvls?
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

If you can afford some Barrow’s items, then go ahead and get 70 Defence. The best place you can train is at the experiments. You need to have done a little part of the ‘Creature of Frankenstrain’ quest to enter the area.

Read full topic
